greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; for m > 0, a(2m) = 2m, a(2m+1) = 4m+2.
comment: Length of period of sequences r(k,n) = floor(sinh(1)*k!) - n*floor(sinh(1)*k!/n) when n is fixed. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 22 2003
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1).
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, a=if (n>1 && n%2, 2*n, n); write("b066043.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 08 2009
results.author: _George E. Antoniou_, Nov 30 2001
